module.name: layered_3d_shape
module.keywords: module, planar, projected, shape, reference, relationship, axis, three-dimensional, 3D

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of information needed to describe non planar or geometric models in a three dimensional context, and relationship between them with three-dimensional transformation.

inscope.li: identification of a geometric model, that defines shape in a three dimensional context;
identification of a geometric model, that is an advanced b rep shape;
identification of a geometric model, that is a curve swept solid shape;
identification of a geometric model, that is a geometrically bounded surface shape representation;
identification of a geometric model, that defines real features in product model in a three dimensional context;
identification of a geometric model, that defines annotation features in product model in a three dimensional context;
identification of an association for reference purpose between two shapes;
items within the scope of application module Advanced boundary representation, ISO/TS 10303-1514;
items within the scope of application module Curve swept solid, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1659;
items within the scope of application module Geometrically bounded surface, ISO/TS 10303-1507;
items within the scope of application module Layered 2d shape, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1693;
items within the scope of application module Part template 3d shape, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1717;
items within the scope of application module Physical unit 3d shape, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1727.
